 2018-04372018-04-20HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Consumer Product Safety Act
SubjectConsumer Products Containing Lead Regulations
PrecisCONSUMER PRODUCTS CONTAINING LEAD REGULATIONS in order to help protect children against potential exposure to lead by expanding the requirements of the Consumer Products Containing Lead (Contact with Mouth) Regulations (CPCLCMR) to include Group 2 products.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0083 Publication Date: 2018-05-02
